original_title: 大哥大 桑塔纳 破小褂
overview: In 1997, documentary filmmaker Chen Xiaoqing (A Bite of China) went to Changtu. Three business owners with very different personalities and values caught his attention: Chang Xianshu, who trafficked in coal, Wang Nianzhong, who opened a food packing factory, and Chang Zhide, who ran a grain and oil business. They were selected as the subjects of this documentary.
title: Big Brother Santana's Torn Coat
